mapper.insert: insert into user(user_nickname, user_name, user_email, user_birth, user_hp, user_pass, user_addr,user_sign_date) values (#{user_nickname},#{user_name},#{user_email},#{user_birth},#{user_hp},#{user_pass},#{user_addr},now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from user where user_email=#{user_email} and user_pass=#{user_pass}
